website_summaries.verdict: A completely organic almond oil that doesn't cost much more than non-organic brands.
pros: Cold-pressed sweet almond oil that is 100% organic with no additives
Thicker than many other brands, but still absorbs well into the skin
cons: The plastic bottle can leak occasionally

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this oil for about 6 months now. It is a great way to manage dry skin and replenish your skin with the nutrients it lacks. I use this oil after I wash my face, then I apply my moisturizer. The bottle came in perfect packaging and you really get your moneys worth. I am finally ordering another bottle after 6 months of using it every other day. My face gets very dry during the winter and I am excited to use it this year!
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Super Good Oil
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing! It melts warmly on my skin with just one drop! I massage under and around my eyes now every evening just while hanging out. Easy! My thin wrinkle lines are virtually disappearing! I’ve started using a little around my lips and on my neck too. Wow what a change I’m seeing! People have even started noticing “something different” about my face. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Meyer

customer_reviews.title: It is an amazing product. I wish I discovered this years ago
customer_reviews.text: I have an oily skin and this worked magic on my skin. Shrunk my pores, got rid of blackheads, evened out my skin tone and made it look younger and vibrant. It is an amazing product. I wish I discovered this years ago. I put rosewater on a cotton pad then add three drops of almond oil and wipe my whole face with it after I wash my face. I am so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unscented & Pure
customer_reviews.text: Avid user of almond oil for years (it’s an ethnic beauty staple passed down in our family for hair conditioning, make up remover & face night/day moisturizer). This is one of the best for dry skin, lightest, non oily & can be used for any skin type (even my sensitive, eczema, dark circles & acne prone!)
customer_reviews.author: Red pet

customer_reviews.title: Quality for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I use this as part of an oil cleansing method. I use this with equal parts of castor oil and lather over my face dry. When my make up is all and broken up i take a warm wet cloth and lay over face for a minute or two then gently wipe away the oil along with every piece of dirt and impurity I accumulated throughout the day. The oil quality is excellent (cold pressed, organic, became free) but also the company is run by sweet people who messaged me to assure the product held up to my standard. Excellent oil. You won't be disappointed. Much better price for the amount that you get than I found at whole foods.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany p.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for DIY face/hair oils
customer_reviews.text: After searching for natural skin care and hair oils online. I became disheartened by the astonishing costs! I decided instead to go the DIY route and make my own. I did a lot of research and came upon this product. It’s fantastic for my homemade essential oil face and hair care products. I have already made 4 two oz bottles of face/hair oils with just one bottle and still have some in there. Organic was very important for me as was price. The quality and price are wonderful for my needs. I’m thankful I decided to give it a try. It will save me a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lalunajf

customer_reviews.title: Recommending to all my friends and family
customer_reviews.text: I use this organic oil for my dry hair. It has helped to give my hair back it’s strength and shine! My hair has drastically reduced breakage, growing faster, and feels thicker. I put it all over my hair 30 minutes before a shower. Shampoo and condition like normal, then dry and style as usual. *For a deeper hydration, use over night (sleep on a towel).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Oil and Terrific Company!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase from Sky Organics. I absolutely love this product! I use this as a carrier oil, and it works perfect in my diy face serum. The product has no scent, and a little goes a long way. I find that it absorbs quickly, and also isn't super greasy. The consistency is perfect; not too thin and not too thick. I highly recommend both the product and Sky Organics!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Eden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, pure product!!
customer_reviews.text: The only facial moisturizer I use now. I got tired of all the chemicals in everything else. Went whole with my diet doing the same with products. I use your rose water the remove my makeup and cleanse my skin and the sweet oil to moisturizer. I love both products. I am always getting compliments on my skin, with or without makeup, and at 56 that makes me feel great. I have combination skin and it works great. I tell everyone about it:
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading advertising -NOT USDA ORGANIC
customer_reviews.text: The picture on the product page clearly shows a bottle with a USDA ORGANIC logo on the front but the product that I received (I have ordered 2 bottles) didn’t have it. Doing some research on the website of the USDA, there is no indication for certification of this company. This is false advertising to put it mildly.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! It is high quality, absorbs quickly, not real greasy and has multiple uses. I use it every day. I use it as a body oil after a shower, as a night time moisturizer for my face, hair conditioner, makeup remover and I put it on scars to fade them. It's a miracle in a bottle:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful Smell
customer_reviews.text: Been buying almond oil for quite some time now and decided on buying from a new source, you know, spread the wealth around. Well I am greatly disappointed with this oil mainly because it SMELLS SO BAD! Used it on my hair a couple of times and then I used it on my face and I couldn't believe the STINK! I mean I wanted to PUKE. Oh well, so much for spreading the wealth.
customer_reviews.author: C. R.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased on March 27, 2019
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product before and found it good but I purchased it again and it didn't smell or feel like the last one. I purchased it for my baby as a moisturizing oil and now I'm scared to use it on her. I feel like I lost my money and my trust in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Neethu Annie Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil to help with the dark circles under my eyes.. This is a miracle oil. In one week I have seen amazing improvement. It has not only helped with the dark circles but also the fine lines. My main concern prior to buying this oil was adding more oil to my already oily skin. This has actually decreased my oily skin. I lathered my face at night and by morning my face was so smooth and shiny. I would highly recommend this oil and I will absolutely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: MIchelleB

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: It smells nothing like almonds. What a waste of money! This is useless greasy junk. If I could rate it zero stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: F Miranda

customer_reviews.title: I guess I expected some sort of fragrance but since ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess I expected some sort of fragrance but since it's a carrier oil it makes sense that it is fragrance-free. This is not a thin, runny oil at all. Nor is it too thick. It removes my makeup (any oil would), and moisturizes my skin without being too greasy. I've also used it on my hair for about 30 minutes before shampooing. It's a big bottle so I hope it doesn't get rancid before I can use it all.
customer_reviews.author: VV

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: So I have used quite a few face oils. I also have rosacea so I am always excited to try new oils to see if they make a difference. Let me tell you! From the first use... it made my skin tone and texture more even. It feels amazing and is super hydrating. It is a bit thicker than say jojoba oil. It did not break out at all. It also makes an amazing massage oil. I can’t recommend this oil enough! MUST TRY!
customer_reviews.author: Mariska

customer_reviews.title: My New Fave Brand.
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great!! I use it for oil cleansing in combination with castor oil and also as a moisturizer. There is no smell (that i can smell). Its smooth and absorbs fast and doesnt leave you greasy. The price is amazing!! You cant find a bottle this size AND ORGANIC, cheaper at your local herbal store (well at least not where i checked). I AM A HAPPY CAMPER. ;) The only drawback that I can see is the shipping is pricey.
customer_reviews.author: GonFerShlong

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed it is not really greasy
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've used almond oil. I applied the oil on my legs and my feet. Oh my! It hydrated my skin already. It feels so smooth. I don't feel itchy. I'm amazed it is not really greasy. I was worried that it would stain my bed sheet over night. It didn't. I tried it in my hair. It was really greasy. I may have put too much on. I will have to experiment this to get it right. I've only used this for 4 days. I do like this product so far. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Heavens Nectar for the Body and Hair.
customer_reviews.text: OMG. This product is simply divine! If you want incredible silky soft skin and hair with no nasty chemicals this is IT!!!!! P.S. as a bonus it evens skin and dark spots or discolorations!!! Who Knew? Now You Do!
customer_reviews.author: Mssy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was not to my liking. It did not seep into the skin well. I would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product great quality. I like that it comes in a dark colored bottle as well so not to compromise the oil from uv rays. I use this every day as a makeup remover/first step cleanser and I also a few drops to my moisturizer. I use it as an all over body oil in the shower as well as adding to my body wash. My skin is finally clear after battling with hormonal adult acne for years and I'm almost 31! Love this almond oil!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Goehe

customer_reviews.title: Sky Organics are great to work with and really care about the product ...
customer_reviews.text: Sky Organics are great to work with and really care about the product they sell and their customers. I've used almond oil for sometime now. I use it as a total face and body moisturizer. I add it to my shaving cream. It's about a 5 sun screen. I had used expensive creams for years and have witnessed better results using almond oil. Add a couple tablespoons to a hot bath with lavender oil before bed,
customer_reviews.author: happy buyer

customer_reviews.title: All sweet almond oil is not created equal
customer_reviews.text: Truly love this oil. Have been using this oil for a year now and loving it as an anti-wrinkle face moisturizer, in my DIY facial cleanser and makeup remover wipes, in my DIY body lotions, lip balms and soaps. I have seen a great improvement in the condition of my skin (face and body). I love that this oil is light on my skin, clear in color, odorless and fresh smelling. Silly me, a few weeks ago I ran out this oil and purchased another brand thinking all almond oil is created equal. "BIG MISTAKE". I am now back with this brand and "BEYOND HAPPY"!
customer_reviews.author: NaNa T

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product
customer_reviews.text: Misleading label, product says organic in the picture but actual product does not have organic label on the bottle, disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pravin Mishra

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for sweet almond oil!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good with the sweet almond oil from Sky Organics. I purchased this oil to use in my home made foaming liquid hand soap recipe and it is doing wonderfully in that. The purchase came with an eBook about carrier oils and I read that this oil is good for cholesterol and you can ingest it. This is a pleasant surprise and I will start a daily regimen to try it out. I am highly satisfied with the product so far. I only took away 1 star because I wish the bottle came with a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Understood

customer_reviews.title: Cracked top 😔
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but was disappointed that it arrived with a cracked top. Luckily it has a stopper in it for shipping and didn’t leak on my clothing. I will transfer it to another bottle for use.
customer_reviews.author: JenAnRob

customer_reviews.title: Only body moisturiser I use
customer_reviews.text: Buy this over and over. I use it as my sole busy moisturiser after showering. My skin soaks it up and it is an amazing all natural moisturiser. I also use it as part of a natural oil mixture for my face. Great results, will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent body moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday after my shower all over my body and sometimes add essential oils but it is also nice just plain. I love to use it under my neck as it really smoothes the lines better than anything else I have used. It's a great all over moisturizer and after a few minutes it's not oily at all. I'd be lost without it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to warm it up in your hands before ...
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to warm it up in your hands before using it as body lotion. Also wait a while for it to absorb and it will stain some materials so I put it on in my PJs and wait. I use it at night on my face and I have seen less pimples. scent is very light.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Smells so clean feels so light
customer_reviews.text: Sky organics have taken over my beauty regime. As I've used up older products I started buying all sky because the quality is perfect every time. This almond oil was no exception. Smells sweet yet subtle.
customer_reviews.author: TashaBee

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Happy
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for adding protection to skin during dry, winter months directly applied to skin and to bath water. I have found this brand of almond oil to be highly refined. The bottle is darkened to keep the UV light out while labeling attractively. It is an especially good product for the cost. The package arrived safely and securely having been packaged and shipped excellently. I will purchase again from this producer and distributor. Can't go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: infrequent flyer

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality of oil!! My dry, color-treated hair eats this stuff up!! I'm a fan!!! My only issue was the seal. It needs to be better because about an inch of oil spilled out and was all over the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lili Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I keep buying it over and over again. It help with my littles eczema and it great to make scented oils.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Good for body and hair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this almond oil for a few years now and had it on subscription, but it lasts so Ling I canx that fie now. I normally use baby oil, but decided to give it a try. I love that I can use it for my skin and hair and that it does not have a scent and is moisturizing but not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: good quality oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this product when formulating skin care products. It has a clean odor and mixes well with other oils/butters.
customer_reviews.author: Mari M

customer_reviews.title: I just recently the sweet almond oil it’s a pretty big bottle I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I just recently the sweet almond oil it’s a pretty big bottle I was expecting like a 4OZ so that’s great I can’t comment on how it works for me yet but I’ll be back with an update as far of how it come in it was ver well packaged & wrapped nothing broken sealed very well
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: This brand is NOT ORGANIC! It’s a scam!
customer_reviews.text: I like this oil it works well, but this company falsely advertises as certified organic, as it is NOT. Do not be fooled if a product online has some copy and pasted USDA Organic seal on the corner of their product, it is a scam. Always check the USDA website and search a brand to see if it is truly, certifiably organic!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle, been using it throughout my pregnancy and all I can say is I cannot go a day without putting it on. I feel more confident and comfortable knowing I’m using a product that actually works in keeping my body moisturized which has thus far (35 weeks) prevented any stretch marks from appearing. It has even made new scratches and markings from my puppy vanish with extensive and consistent use. Keyword here is “consistent”. Thank you sky organics, truly!
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Nourishing moisturizer when applied to damp skin.
customer_reviews.text: The almond oil was exactly what I needed to make a moisturizer / salve. It’s also perfect for an all over moisturizer as is - applied to damp skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jon and Anne

customer_reviews.title: Beat hair products!
customer_reviews.text: I love my sweet almond oil, after moisturizing my hair the oil helps seals in the moisture. It prevents my hair from being dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS FAKE PRODUCT it's NOT organic
customer_reviews.text: the oil has no scent, is very clear, and the packaging is misleading. this is no USDA certified organic label. I highly doubt this is legit sweet almond oil. Even the packaging for this item looks fake af.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I tried sweet almond oil for the first time because I wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried sweet almond oil for the first time because I wanted to start going all natural for skincare. I mixed it with castor oil and olive oil for oil cleansing. My skin has become much brighter and moist with the combination of oils. I would definitely buy this oil again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: very nice oil
customer_reviews.text: Used it as an additive for home made bath melts, worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oil that doesn't leave my skin oily
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice light odorless oil that absorbs quickly and doesn't leave my skin feeling oily. I've used it as a carrier oil with essential oils and I mixed it with castile soap and essential oils to make a shower soap.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great as a body lotion substitute
customer_reviews.text: This oil has replaced my use of body lotion as I tend to dry skin year round. It leaves my skin moisturized and supple feeling after an initial period of feeling a little greasy. I initially purchased this as a replacement for face lotion but after a couple months it no longer seemed to work well for this purpose (e.g. I developed dry spots) so I've returned to using specific face lotion products. Just purchased my second bottle and expect to continue to use this for body.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend seller I bought it from :)
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The seller even sent me a DIY e-book of beauty recipes. It includes info on other oils and what those are good for, too. I've already tried some with this almond oil and I'm loving the results on my skin and hair! :D
customer_reviews.author: Arleen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the oil and so does my kitty 😂
customer_reviews.author: Dominika

customer_reviews.title: Excellent carrier oil to use with my essential oils
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Excellent carrier oil to use with my essential oils. Very well packaged. Arrived without any leakage. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: the packaging wasn't so good. The cap of my castor oil broke so ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Almond Oil and the Castor Oil, they did wonders to my hair. However, the packaging wasn't so good. The cap of my castor oil broke so the oil leacked through the box. The package need to be more secure and protective. But all in all the oil is great!
customer_reviews.author: Merabel B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, big plastic bottle
customer_reviews.text: Good quality oil, no scent, clear oil. I use it to remove make up, on face and body or mixed with other lotions for general moisturizer. Nice big size, in dark plastic bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ig140

customer_reviews.title: Great Almond oil.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t give a star on scent, due to the fact it’s odorless, which I don’t mind at all. I like as a great moisturizer my skin is very dry , and with this stay hydrated for long time. I’m very happy with this brand. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Dega

customer_reviews.title: Good for many uses.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. I bought this as a recommendation that almond oil may help my daughter's cradle cap. We have notice a reduction in her cradle cap since using. I have also been using it on my eczema. Although I didn't notice an immediate difference, about one week after starting use, my eczema visually looks better (which was a huge concern for me because it's on my hands and forearms).
customer_reviews.author: C. Shep

customer_reviews.title: Light and absorbs well.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this oil. It is light and absorbs well. I use it as a moisturizer on my skin and add Rose Hip Seed Oil and a little Frankincense Essential Oil to use on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie My Lady

customer_reviews.title: Shop with Sky
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It's on my subscription. I never have a problem with it arriving spilled out or broken cap. Sky Organics is my go to supplier for oils and butters.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J

customer_reviews.title: Great for oil cleansing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this sweet almond oil for several months as a face wash with the oil cleansing method. It is gentle and hydrating and has been working well in a routine with my other products to keep me acne free.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and odorless!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, odorless, beautiful product that the women of my family really love. It was a great buy. We look forward to purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: John Boutsis

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair skin and nails
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was sold in gallon jugs. We use it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Tianna G

customer_reviews.title: This is a purchase you won't regret.
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I mix it with my essential oil, & it makes my skin so soft. You get best results, applying it after you shower. I apply it under my eyes at night, for dark circles. I can say. . . . I don't have any(it works). Looking to purchase a larger size, if there's one available. My two daughter's love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sherie Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell, texture and everything about this product. Perfect for DIY face and body serums
customer_reviews.author: charleagh2525

customer_reviews.title: In love with this GREAT sweet almond oil!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It leaves my hands and face well hydrated, not greasy at all. Also smells great. My skin absorbs it very quick. I usually mix it with my lavanda essential oil and works great. Love the packaging too. Super happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: 100% pure Almond oil!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely AMAZING!!! A must have for hair, face and body!! I love it and Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Toranj

customer_reviews.title: Best baby oil
customer_reviews.text: Have gone through reviews of lot of products and this one I was able to narrow down and it’s been 8 months of my kid using it .. so far it’s smooth and no side affects and no rashes .. organic product and I recommend this for kids or new borns who have soft to chemicals..
customer_reviews.author: jxp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.text: This was a repeat order of a superior product. The Sky Organics Best Sweet Almond Oil does not leave a greasy look on my skin and hair but does leave them softer to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Irenea

customer_reviews.title: Better then other brands
customer_reviews.text: This is better than other expensive brands and value for money; however, it made my baby's skin little darker (maybe it is more pure than other but not sure)
customer_reviews.author: Ravi

customer_reviews.title: Using it as Baby oil
customer_reviews.text: I have been using almond oil for my toddler since she was 6 months old. It is very nourishing. In winter however, I had to apply thicker oil like castor to reduce the dryness on her cheeks.
customer_reviews.author: Pavs

customer_reviews.title: Great shine
customer_reviews.text: It didn't have a smell to it like I thought it should with how almond oil usually smells but otherwise it works really well
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Good for all over use.
customer_reviews.text: Good light oil for head to toe daily grooming. Great in hair, wont weigh hair down. Delightful light scent.
customer_reviews.author: English

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, flavor, I'm very pleased with product and will be purchasing more,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective oil. Lives up to it’s commitment.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best Organic sweet almond oil that I have used. I prefer using organic natural products that are free from any additives which this almond oil is. I use it as moisturizer for skin and oiling my hair. It gets absorbed very easily and deeply nourishes making skin look soft and smooth. Provides great natural nourishment for skin and hair.
customer_reviews.author: M Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Almond Oil Success 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it! I have never bought sweet almond oil before but boy do I love it now! 😍 I like to use it to remove my mascara and to add to face creams and serums
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: The oil is kind of thick and has no scent whatsoever. Not what I expected from almond oil. Maybe I got too used to a certain French brand, who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Breno de Faria

customer_reviews.title: Great natural moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a carrier oil for EO i put in my hair to sleep in, works great for that. Ive also been using it on my skin as a moisturizer. It leaves my skin feeling soft and glowy all day. Ladies, awesome for those summertime fine arms and legs!
customer_reviews.author: GVluvU

customer_reviews.title: Almond oil
customer_reviews.text: Use this daily after bathing - great moisturize!! Love this product!!! Also use as carrier oil for essential oil application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as Castro oil but still great for stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Sweet almond oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I use it for my hair and body, not to thick, not too thin texture. Soothes my very dry skill. The smell does not compete with my perfume! Glad I tried this product, excellent!
customer_reviews.author: S E

customer_reviews.title: Sweet almond oil
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for my hair and my face sometimes all over my body , also been using it on my sons eczema.. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but packaging not the best
customer_reviews.text: I love the oil but when I received it a lot of the oil has spilled in the box.
customer_reviews.author: pau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect body massage oil for babies
customer_reviews.text: Im using this oil as my 6 months old baby body massage oil since she was 1 month old.i just love it it gives very good feeling to my baby and after wash it leaves a smooth texture for her skin.
customer_reviews.author: madhuri

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this brand of almond oil my times! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Dufour

customer_reviews.title: Misleading/Not certified organic
customer_reviews.text: This product is misleading as it is not really certified organic.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Liu

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS ALMOND OIL.ALMOND OIL IS SPECTACULAR.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE SCENT VERY MUCH. IT IS VERY EFFECTIVE.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Thompkins

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of good almond oil I found for new born baby, It’s really good for massage, and moisturizer. It’s non sticky as well.
customer_reviews.author: vijay r patel

customer_reviews.title: Best results
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil for my entire body. It has replaced any face cream at night and moisturizer in the morning
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I use sweet almond oil in my body butter and really like this beans. And SUPER fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: TPS

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil! Not sticky like other and I have curly hair so I combine with my shampoo, I put it on my face and dry lips and my skin and people have been complementing me of how supple my skin and how soft my hair looks. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this oil.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a base oil for my essential oil roller bottles. It is a good price and a good oil.

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier oil
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier oil, and mixes well with essential oils. Absorbs very well into the skin.
customer_reviews.author: GioL

customer_reviews.title: Goes on very nicely
customer_reviews.text: This is lovely, goes on very smooth. I add some essential for a perfectly scented therapeutic massage oil, mainly for muscle aches. It is pleasant unscented too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weir

customer_reviews.title: Hair moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for skin and hair. Really moisturizes my hair, keeping it so so soft. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: est902

customer_reviews.title: My dry skin normally hates oil. (I know, ...
customer_reviews.text: My dry skin normally hates oil. (I know, its weird.) But it loves this oil, and drinks it right up. My skin feels so moisturized after applying this oil. I usually apply it at night.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: I love all of the products that I have purchased from ...
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the products that I have purchased from you! I make almost everything myself and your products help me by knowing they are pure and contain no toxins or chemicals
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting for Any Food!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the almond oil for our baked fish and vegetables for about a half of a year. The only thing that I would prefer is if it were in a glass container. I try not to purchase food items in plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Strassberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil but still experimenting
customer_reviews.text: Still experimenting with this oil. Has helped with eczema on my hands. Have used it under my eyes and they do seem brighter, but will have to use longer to determine results.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating, neutral smell and good for removing make up
customer_reviews.text: Best almond oil I've purchased, applies evenly and is super hydrating. Smell is neutral which is great. Use it to remove makeup and also mix with cream and apply to my face and body.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mkva

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly how I knew it would
customer_reviews.text: The gave the results I was looking for, my hair appears to be more manageable. I can finally touch my hair without any regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Good

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I have extremely dry skin and after ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have extremely dry skin and after just a few days of use, I have noticed a huge difference on my face, arms, hands and feet. Will definitely continue to use this product.

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I put it in my homemade lotion. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Smells soooooo good!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Sky Organics!! I use this oil to make handsoap. So much healthier and cheaper than constantly buying handsoap. Got my recipe from Pinterest.

customer_reviews.text: First of all, I love "Sky Organics" products. I use this as a moisturizer and as a hair conditioner. For skin moisturizing, I alternate with hemp seed oil.

product_meta.title: Sweet Almond Oil by Sky Organics (Large 16oz) Pure Cold-Pressed Almond Face Oil Moisturizing Oil for Body Skin & Hair
feature_bullets: Contains: 1 x 16 oz. bottle of 100% pure, cold-pressed Sweet Almond Oil by Sky Organics
Gentle Skin Moisturizer: Use Sweet Almond Oil as a natural body oil to gently moisturize and helps soften dry skin.
Natural Massage Oil: Use Sky Organics Sweet Almond Oil as a skin-soothing massage oil, or as a carrier oil for your favorite essential oils.
Fast Absorbing and Non-Greasy: Sky Organics Sweet Almond Oil has a silky, lightweight texture that absorbs into skin with ease, without leaving a greasy residue behind.
Responsibly Made: Our Almond Oil is responsibly sourced, vegan and cruelty-free, and contains no added ingredients or fragrance.
